title: Pclinuxos Big Daddy p.93a
description:
This is my first torrent upload. Hopefully I\&#039;ve done everything right. This torrent is for Pclinuxos Big Daddy p.93a. I\&#039;m posting it here because the official mirror seems to be slow and I did not see a full unedited version hosted here.

This file is exactly as it was when it came off of their server. It\&#039;s a very complete version of Linux that has excellent hardware detection. I have tried it on 2 of my computers (a laptop and a desktop) and have not ran across a single piece of hardware that did not work right out of the box. 

It runs as a live cd and you can install from the same cd if you wish. It\&#039;s really simple to use and great for windows users that may want to try to figure out what Linux is all about. 

Anyway it\&#039;s here if anyone wants it. Have fun with it.
